column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Entrees: We both had the filet mignon
column2: medium rare. The steaks were cooked as ordered (very pink middle) and had great flavoring. They gave us extra steak salt flavoring rub to sprinkle on top
column3: which added a nice texture and flavor. Next time I plan to try the butter/garlic sauce. But I found the filet to be much more flavorful than many other steak joints in town. It came with a bernaise sauce on the side
